TechBBS Xenforo 2.1 greenify
data.description:
This theme greenified from the original dark theme.

- Added more green!
- Tweaked the big avatar icons and removed the small ones.
- You can select to show/disable Sidebar, userbanners and direct store links. Also Usermenu position is selectable.
- Small other tweaks!
-Added test color option

data.name: Kamen Rider Heisei Generation
Modern Yahoo! JAPAN
data.description:
Yahoo! JAPANのデザインを、シンプルで見やすいものに変更します。

・全体的なデザインを変更します
・明るい緑を基調とするデザインになります
・ロゴが変更されます(現在、新バージョンの仕様変更に対応できていないため、変更されません)
・フォントがメイリオになります
・サイトの横幅が大きくなります

*Note: This style only works with the Japanese version.

data.name: Night Tabun
Jamf Pro Dark Mode
data.description: GitHub Source Now that MacOS has a native dark mode, I think Jamf deserves one, too! I have spent 20+ hours combing through page after page of the Jamf Pro console and adjusting the colors to create a general 'dark mode' theme. My changes affect the text weight and colors, backgrounds, the dashboard, lists, tables, sidebars, policies, inventory, assistants, dialog boxes, buttons, checkboxes, search bars, alerts, and for multiple event states (normal, disabled, hover, focus, active). There is a mild contrast improvement. Feel free to submit additional changes to the source code on GitHub. Please leave a comment so I know why you've edited that particular section. This is my first attempt at anything approaching "web front-end" anything in over 15 years, so please be kind.
